privacyCash.keyVulnerability: Amounts visible on-chain enable correlation attacks. 5.3% of withdrawals linked to deposits.

shadowWire.keyVulnerability: Bulletproofs hide amounts but addresses are plaintext visible. 50.5% have both sender and recipient exposed.

silentSwap.keyVulnerability: Wallets that both send and receive through SilentSwap are linkable. 15.8% exposure rate.

summary.recommendation: SilentSwap provides the best privacy (64 score, 15.8% linkable) via cross-chain routing. Privacy Cash (39 score, 5.3% linkable) and ShadowWire (48 score, 50.5% linkable) both have significant vulnerabilities.
summary.methodology: Analysis based on on-chain data. Privacy Cash attacked via timing+amount correlation. ShadowWire addresses directly visible. SilentSwap attacked via round-trip wallet detection.
